text: Frank George Jackson (born October 4, 1946) is an American attorney and politician. He was the 57th Mayor of Cleveland, Ohio from 2006 until 2022. He was first elected on November 8, 2005 and re-elected in 2009, 2013, and 2017. He was the longest serving mayor in Cleveland history.Jackson wins historic 4th term - Cleveland 19.com (WOIO/WUAB) ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Cleveland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Cleveland
title: Frank G. Jackson
